enumeratedValue.description: PDB0 channel 0 back-to-back operation with ADC0 COCO[7:0]; PDB1 channel 0 back-to-back operation with ADC1 COCO[7:0] ; PDB2 channel 0 back-to-back operation with ADC2 COCO[7:0]
Channel 0 of PDB0, PDB1 and PDB2 back-to-back operation with COCO[7:0] of ADC0, ADC1 and ADC2
FTM0 external clock driven by TCLK0 pin
FTM0 external clock driven by TCLK1 pin
FTM0 external clock driven by TCLK2 pin
FTM1 external clock driven by TCLK0 pin
FTM1 external clock driven by TCLK1 pin
FTM1 external clock driven by TCLK2 pin
FTM2 external clock driven by TCLK0 pin
FTM2 external clock driven by TCLK1 pin
FTM2 external clock driven by TCLK2 pin
FTM3 external clock driven by TCLK0 pin
FTM3 external clock driven by TCLK1 pin
FTM3 external clock driven by TCLK2 pin
Write 1 to assert the TRIG1 input to FTM0. Software must clear this bit to allow other trigger sources to assert
Write 1 to assert the TRIG1 input to FTM1. Software must clear this bit to allow other trigger sources to assert
Write 1 to assert the TRIG1 input to FTM2. Software must clear this bit to allow other trigger sources to assert
Write 1 to assert the TRIG1 input to FTM3. Software must clear this bit to allow other trigger sources to assert
exclusive OR of FTM2_CH0,FTM2_CH1, and FTM1_CH1

field.name: FTM0_OUTSEL
field.description: FTM0 channel modulation select with FTM1_CH1

field.name: FTM3_OUTSEL
field.description: FTM3 channel modulation select with FTM2_CH1

enumeratedValue.description: Flash remains enabled during Wait mode
Flash is disabled for the duration of Wait mode
8 KB of program flash memory, 0.25 KB protection region
16 KB of program flash memory, 0.5 KB protection region
32 KB of program flash memory, 1 KB protection region
64 KB of program flash memory, 2 KB protection region
128 KB of program flash memory, 4 KB protection region
256 KB of program flash memory, 8 KB protection region
512 KB of program flash memory, 16 KB protection region

field.name: TRACEFRAC
field.description: Trace clock divider fraction To configure TRACEDIV and TRACEFRAC, the user must clear TRACEDIVEN at first to disable the trace clock divide function

field.name: TRACEDIV
field.description: Trace clock divider divisor To configure TRACEDIV, the user must disable TRACEDIVEN at first, and then enable it after setting TRACEDIV

enumeratedValue.description: Software can send an interrupt to CPU
